question:
You recently went to a concert and thought one of the singers was very good. You want to tell him how you feel.

Write a letter to the singer. In your letter

- say how you feel about his performance
- give details of your musical activities 
- explain how you would like him to help you with your musical activities
text: I have been a big fan of you for many years since you released your first album. From that time, I have been waiting so long for your concert to be held in my city. A couple of days ago, I was very happy that you were going to perform in Paradise Concert Hall.

I can truly say that night was one of the best nights of my entire life. During your singing, I could not bear the suspense while I was singing with you word by word. In addition, It had such a lasting impression on me that I definitely attend your next concert wherever it is.

I would like to share with you that I am pursuing my dream to be a professional guitarist like you. To be honest, I have been playing the guitar for six months after your last album in which you played it outstandingly, and made me interested in this amazing musical instrument.

For this reason, I honestly think you can help me to hone my skill in your classes even though you have many apprentices. Therefore, I would like to kindly ask you to put my name in one of your classes.
I am very much looking forward to hearing from you very soon.
